column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: Preliminary reports say authorities detained a Chinese man carrying two firearms in Sihanoukville.------The unnamed suspect was arrested at 01:30 am on  Sunday
column4: 07.03.2020 in Sangkat 4.------ The Chinese man is currently being detained at Preah Sihanouk Provincial Police headquarters pending further investigation and legal proceedings. ------KPSBN
